reviews.text:
If you're reading this debating on trying this place out, head that way right now! 
The drinks were all incredible - from the mules to the espresso martini....
Awesome food!  I hope that the quality stays high and consistent because I could easily see this becoming a favorite place of mine.
Great service, great food, really nice time!  We stopped in for appetizers late one Friday and thought the place and food was lovely! We will definitely...
